snippet.title: Rigid Force Alpha // Trailer
snippet.description:
++++++ RIGID FORCE ALPHA ++++++
Classic Shoot'em Up Action is Back!

Coming to Steam on August 31st 2018 - wishlist now! http://store.steampowered.com/app/724390/Rigid_Force_Alpha

Rigid Force Alpha breathes new life into the side-scrolling shooter genre with its hand-crafted 3D graphics, stunning environments, and detailed visual effects. Players can arm their fighters with numerous upgradeable weapons, increase their firepower with adjustable Force Shards and collect Energy Orbs to unleash extremely powerful blasts against an armada of enemies and huge bosses.

Check our website and follow us on our social media channels for all the latest news!

Rigid Force Alpha: http://rigidforcealpha.com8com1.com

Developer: http://www.com8com1.com
Press Kit: http://com8com1.com/press/sheet.php?p=rigid_force_alpha
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/com8com1
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/com8com1
